|brand = Compex |model = WLE600VX |submodelappend = <!-- yes for space --> |submodel = -I (Industrial temp.) |revision = <!-- Model Revision, Leave blank for none or unknown --> |subrevision = <!-- Model Subrevision, Leave blank for none or unknown --> |model_part_num = |page_start_date = 02/01/2016 |page_start_origon = https://wikidevi.com/wiki/Compex_WLE600VX-I |sernum = <!-- Serial number prefix --> |wlclass = AC1200 |series = <!-- Device series --> |if = Mini PCIe |if_bus_version = 1.1 |ifconnector = Mini PCIe |formfactor = Mini Card
|vendor_id = <!-- Leave blank for none --> |device_id = <!-- Leave blank for none --> |subvendor_id = <!-- Leave blank for none --> |subdevice_id = <!-- Leave blank for none --> |id_string = <!-- PnP ID string --> |windosid = <!-- Windows ID, Leave blank for none --> |fcc_id = TK4WLE600VX |icid = <!-- Industry Canada ID, Leave blank for none --> |boardid = <!-- Board ID --> |ecc_id = <!-- eec-id --> |oui = <!-- OUI -->
|chip1 = Qualcomm Atheros;QCA9892; |chip2 = <!-- Brand;Model;Extra, info; --> |chip3 = <!-- Brand;Model;Extra, info; --> |chip4 = <!-- Brand;Model;Extra, info; -->
|antconn = U.FL |antenna = <!-- Antenna type --> |txchains = 2 |rxchains = 2 |sstreams = 2 |wirelessstand = IEEE 802.11a/b/g/n/ac |802.11ac = 867 |802.11n = 300/300 |802.11g = 54 |802.11b = 11 |802.11a = 54 |wififreq = 2.412~2.472, 5.180~5.825 |receive_sens = <!-- Receive sensitivity --> |transmit_power = <!-- Transmit power -->

|availability = <!-- Market availability --> |eoldate = <!-- End of Life date --> |fccapprovdate = 05/21/2015 |estreldate = <!-- Estimated release date --> |estprice = <!-- Estimated retail price in US dollars --> |upc = <!-- UPC number --> |ean = <!-- EAN number --> |dx_sku = <!-- DealExtreme sku --> |newegg = <!-- newegg item number --> |asin = <!-- ASIN number --> |asin_country = <!-- ASIN country --> |asin2 = <!-- ASIN number --> |asin_country2 = <!-- ASIN country --> |country = China
|powledcolor = <!-- Led colors and descriptions --> |connactled = <!-- Led colors and descriptions --> |spdledcolor = <!-- Led colors and descriptions --> |leddupcolor = <!-- Led colors and descriptions --> |dimmin = <!-- Size of device --> |weight = <!-- Weight of device -->
}}{{TIDTOC|adapter}} ==Overview== {{CompexMailKimp}}
===Product Key Features=== *[[Qualcomm Atheros]] QCA9892 *Industrial Grade Chipset *2.4GHz max 21dBm & 5GHz max 20dBm output power (per chain) *IEEE 802.11ac compliant & backward compatible with 802.11a/b/g/n *2×2 MIMO Technology, up to 867Mbps *MiniPCI Express 1.1 interface *Supports Spatial Multiplexing, Cyclic-Delay Diversity (CDD), Low-Density Parity Check :(LDPC) Codes, Maximal Ratio Combining (MRC), Space Time Block Code (STBC) *Supports IEEE 802.11d, e, h, I, k, r, v time stamp, and w standards *Supports Dynamic Frequency Selection (DFS) *Cards are individually calibrated for Quality Assurance *Support Industrial Operating Temperature *Supported by '''OpenWRT''' with ath10k driver on WPJ344, WPJ558 and WPQ864.
===Ordering Configuration=== {| class="wikitable" border="1" |- ! Item Code ! Chipset ! Card Information |- | WLE600VX 7BA000S | QCA9892 | 2×2 802.11ac 2.4/5GHz PCIe mini card |}
==Links of Interest== ===Purchase Sample=== [http://shop.compex.com.sg/wle600vx-itemp.html Compex System Sample Store]
